DataElement.preferredName: Full Dose Anticoagulant Agent Current Use Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether there is current use or reciept of the full dose of an anticoagulant, a drug that helps prevent blood clots from forming.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Full Dose Anticoagulant Agent Current Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the current use or reciept of the full dose of an anticoagulant, a drug that helps prevent blood clots from forming.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Containing as much or as many as is possible or normal.:The amount of medicine taken, or radiation given, at one time.:Agents that prevent blood clotting. Naturally occurring agents in the blood are included only when they are used as drugs.

Concepts.definition: Containing as much or as many as is possible or normal.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
Any agent capable of preventing blood clot formation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF1 Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient receiving therapeutic anticoagulation, or regularly using aspirin at > 325 mg per day, or using non-steroidal anti-inflammatory agents, or other agents known to inhibit platelet function

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient receiving therapeutic anticoagulation?
